segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s start with some basics. Can you tell me your first name and last name, please?
segments.client_message: Sure! My name's, um, John, John Smith.

segments.advisor_message: Thank you, John. And, uh, do you have any middle names you'd like to share?
segments.client_message: Oh, I don’t really have middle names or anything, just John Smith, that’s it!
